trans-unit.source: Provides a client-side logical representation for Microsoft Azure Storage Analytics.
trans-unit.target: Provides a client-side logical representation for Microsoft Azure Storage Analytics.

trans-unit.source: This client is used to configure and execute requests against storage analytics.
trans-unit.target: This client is used to configure and execute requests against storage analytics.

trans-unit.source: The analytics service client encapsulates the endpoints for the Blob and Table services.
trans-unit.target: The analytics service client encapsulates the endpoints for the Blob and Table services.

trans-unit.source: It also encapsulates credentials for accessing the storage account.
trans-unit.target: It also encapsulates credentials for accessing the storage account.
